outline:
1. to flow, pour out, pour, gush forth, spring, bubble up, ferment
    1. (Qal) to flow
    2. (Hiphil) to pour out, emit, cause to bubble, belch forth
      1. to pour out
      2. to cause to bubble, ferment
      3. to pour forth, emit, belch forth
kjv_def: belch out, flowing, pour out, send forth, utter (abundantly).
strongs_def: to gush forth; figuratively, to utter (good or bad words); specifically, to emit (a foul odor)
